text: “læa cng raluk khna thi chay txn di thahı swyngam kæ phwk khea sung kar ngan khxng phwk khea læa man di klaw wa wan ni mimi phu dı nı hmu mnusʹy chna phwk than di læa thæcring nan chan khux phu chwyhelux phwk than khran meux thang sxng fay tang mxng hen kan læw man k klab sn thea thang sxng khxng man læa klaw wa thæcring chan mi keiywkhxng kab phwk than thæcring chan kalang hen sing thi phwk than mi hen thæcring chan klaw xallxhˌ læa xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng runræng nı kar lngthosʹ”
